Herb Sheldon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herb_Sheldon 0 Herb Sheldon (born Herbert Sussman in Brooklyn, New York, January 1913 - July 21, 1964) was an American television personality and entertainer. Herb_Sheldon ( born Herbert_Sussman in Brooklyn , New_York , January_1913 - July_21_,_1964 ) was an_American_television_personality_and_entertainer .
